article_title: Why Pakistan Must Act to Reassure India After Terror Attack
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: India would certainly be justified in calling off the talks. But Indian leaders must weigh whether that is the best response, given it would fulfill the goal of the terrorists.
